name: Rattata

abilities.name: Trickery
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch 1 of your Prizes with the top card of your deck. This power can't be used if Rattata is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.

flavorText: Loves to eat walnuts, chestnuts, cheese, and milk.

strengths: Trickery can swap prized cards to retrieve them

competitiveHistory: This Team Rocket Rattata had one of the most unique abilities - Trickery could swap Prize cards with the top card of your deck. This was incredibly useful for retrieving important cards stuck in prizes. Free retreat and Psychic resistance made it a solid tech card.

rulings.ruling: Trickery swaps a Prize card with the top card of your deck. You don't get to look at your Prizes before choosing.
You can use Here Comes Team Rocket! to see your Prizes, then use Trickery to swap out a card you want.
